name: Hashiru Neko - The Gaem
description:
This is good game for just killing time. For example do you know the feeling when stranger gets in same elevator and there is long way to your floor? Yup, open this game and look busy on your phone. Now  you don't have to say (hopefullu) anything!

Designed for 16:9 aspect ratio. I have little bit narrower phone but it still works fine!

<there is no sounds done in game yet! (There is not awkward moments in elevator when your phone starts to scream ;3)
